alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 27 at 1:53PM MDT until March 29 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TUESDAY TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches in the mountains above 6500 feet MSL and 3 to 7 inches in the valleys below. * WHERE...Stanley, Ketchum, Sun Valley, Galena Summit, and Copper Basin. * WHEN...From 9 AM Tuesday to noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Sawtooth, Stanley Basin; Sun Valley Region
